body: How do u know when your ban has been appealed? I appealed three days ago and idk if or when I get un banned? Anybody?
body_tagged: How do u know when your ban has been appealed? I appealed three days ago and idk if or when I get un banned? Anybody?
title: Ban Appeals

replies.body: You can log into Avicus and the ban is green on your infractions page.
replies.body_tagged: You can log into Avicus and the ban is green on your infractions page.

replies.body: You will get an email response saying if you are unbanned or not.
replies.body_tagged: You will get an email response saying if you are unbanned or not.

replies.body:
Moved to Avicus Help.

A Sr.Mod will respond to your email about your ban.
replies.body_tagged:
Moved to Avicus Help.

A Sr.Mod will respond to your email about your ban.

replies.body: You should receive an e-mail from a Senior Mod regarding the status about your ban appeal. You can also check your infractions page and see if the "ban" infraction is green instead of white.
replies.body_tagged: You should receive an e-mail from a Senior Mod regarding the status about your ban appeal. You can also check your infractions page and see if the "ban" infraction is green instead of white.

replies.body:
Appealed ban:

Still banned:

Hang in there m8 :)
replies.body_tagged:
Appealed ban:

Still banned:

Hang in there m8 :)

replies.body: How long before I know I emailed about 4 days ago, is there any limit of appealing more than once because idk if I email avicus support
replies.body_tagged: How long before I know I emailed about 4 days ago, is there any limit of appealing more than once because idk if I email avicus support

replies.body: Yes, it should come up green on your infractions !
replies.body_tagged: Yes, it should come up green on your infractions !

replies.body: Also just saying you may not be able to get unbanned you got banned for having multiple infractions and you cant really change that !
replies.body_tagged: Also just saying you may not be able to get unbanned you got banned for having multiple infractions and you cant really change that !

replies.body: I know a lot of people who have appealed that kind of infraction successfully.
replies.body_tagged: I know a lot of people who have appealed that kind of infraction successfully.

replies.body: how long it takes to get a reply from avicus support?

replies.body: I send an email asking desban because they accused me of an alleged "kill aura" .... I sent my .minecraft tests and even sent my youtube channel to believe me. It's been four days since I sent the request for desban and nothing happened.
replies.body_tagged: I send an email asking desban because they accused me of an alleged "kill aura" .... I sent my .minecraft tests and even sent my youtube channel to believe me. It's been four days since I sent the request for desban and nothing happened.

replies.body:
If you have not received a response within 4 days of submitment, then you may send in another one, but don't spam the email.

Oh, and try not to double post please! ;)
replies.body_tagged:
If you have not received a response within 4 days of submitment, then you may send in another one, but don't spam the email.

Oh, and try not to double post please! ;)

replies.body: I already sent the mail again, but I wish to see.
replies.body_tagged: I already sent the mail again, but I wish to see.

replies.body:
Hi. 

Ban appeals can take up to a week to answer, so please be patient. If you don't recieve a reply soon, you can always re-contact us at support@avicus.net. 

Second, please do not bump old topics. Thank you! :)
replies.body_tagged:

Ban appeals can take up to a week to answer, so please be patient. If you don't recieve a reply soon, you can always re-contact us at support@avicus.net. 

Second, please do not bump old topics. Thank you! :)
